inclusion.criterion: Patients in stable conditions (no acute exacerbations in the 4 weeks before enrolment)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has been stable for 4 weeks

inclusion.criterion: well adapted to ventilation and without problems with the ventilation mask.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is well adapted to ventilation and does not have problems with the mask.

exclusion.criterion: Patients with acute respiratory failure, recent exacerbations, severe co-morbidities (i.e. hearth failure, recent stroke etc.)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Patient does not have acute respiratory failure or recent exacerbations

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. They are currently on BiPap with 5L and have been experiencing agitation and altered mental status.
